milestones.title: q4a - js-ipfs on the browser
milestones.description: This milestone's focus is to ship a version of js-ipfs that can be embed in browser applications, creating an IPFS node inside a browser web application.

milestones.title: q4b - Quality and correctness of the JavaScript Implementation
milestones.description: The focus of this milestone is quality of the JavaScript implementation so that users of the library can build their applications with confidence.

milestones.title: q4c - The InterPlanetary JavaScript
milestones.description: Settle in what will be the 'good parts' for us to use accross JS projects

milestones.title: q4d - interface-floodsub
milestones.description: Define an interface for floodsub, that can be implemented for js-ipfs and js-ipfs-api

milestones.title: q4e - Awesome IPLD
milestones.description: Integration of IPLD (js-ipld and js-ipld-ipfs) into js-ipfs. Enable js-ipfs to handle both merkledag protobufs and ipld cbor objects

milestones.title: q4f - Async Crypto
milestones.description: Move away from bundling in node-forge and use the WebCrypto browser primitives directly

milestones.title: q4g - Bitswap Complete
milestones.description: Make js-ipfs-bitswap work at the same level go-ipfs-bitswap

milestones.title: q4h - js-ipfs and js-ipfs-api bundling
milestones.description: Make it work with any bundler, out of the box or provide proper documentation if not possible.

milestones.title: q4i - Documentation of all the modules
q4j - Quick Start examples for js-ipfs and js-ipfs-api
milestones.description: Provide quick start examples for js-ipfs and js-ipfs-api
